alert.note: Alert for Northeast Mountains (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 27 at 1:52PM PDT by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Pend Oreille County through 215 PM PDT... At 151 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Nordman, or 31 miles north of Priest River. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Pend Oreille County. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
